gals/

ajs_choloniewski.pro

topajs_choloniewski

result = ajs_choloniewski(absmag, sb [, params], mstar=mstar, alpha=alpha, phistar=phistar, sbstar=sbstar, sigmasb=sigmasb, beta=beta)

This function generates a Choloniewski function along an input array of absolute magnitudes and surface brightnesses.

Compatible with mpfit2d. Magnitudes only

Return value

This function returns an rray of phi for corresponding absmag, sbr

Parameters

absmag
sb
params in optional

[mstar,alpha,phistar,sbstar,sigmasb,beta] OR input separately:

Keywords

mstar
alpha
phistar
sbstar
sigmasb
beta

Examples
